comments.body: If this wall light were to be added, I think that it should have to be activated by redstone.
Also, for copper horns, the sound played would be dependent on facing direction: Up = Player Looks Up, Forward = Regular, Down = Shift.

Well darn I accidentally marked this as a beta feature! How do I fix this?
Don't get me wrong I love the way the caves look. They're phenomenal!! But the ore generation is insane.

Actually... as far as I can tell the Ore generation is mostly the same as it used to be. The problem is that all the ores are way more visible because the caves are huge! (Correct me if I'm wrong, please).
I am having trouble finding iron ore‚Ä¶ found 2 stacks of diamonds in an hour of exploring but only 40 or so iron ore. Also it seems like deep slate doesn‚Äôt spawn below y0

Minecraft DOES NOT need to be realistic. It can have realistic elements, yes. But be 100% realistic and have knowledge of every element's reactive properties? No, that's over excessive in a block game with pigs that walk on two feet, also that would just ruin the 10+ years of strategy with gold and iron needing to be smelted, nobody would like it.
Como hago para que pueda entrar al servidor
They should also keep the old mountains, just make them less common.
you're right. but i don't have ps4

Hello, this appears to be a non-English post. Below you will find a transcription of the topic being discussed.

o que tambien te salgan colgadas en la espalda
Mojang cut off support for lower end devices so that updates wouldn‚Äôt have to be simplified in order to accommodate those devices.
i agree, it's unfair to just cut off some of the community

I know it might be sad for the affected. If they can ever get a more powerful device, they can get to see Realms and all the cool new features again. Adding support for low end devices means more work for Mojang and can further cut off the Minecraft community because of smaller updates. Consoles should be fine.

  • Alternatively, all support for 32-bit devices can be ended to match Java 24w14a. That means less work for Mojang. https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/25616407569293--Java-Parity-End-support-for-32-bit-devices
Comigo tamb√©m aconteceu. Tentei o resgate dentro do prazo, que foi at√© o dia 20. Coloquei est√°tuas em v√°rios mapas e nada.
Same. I even got a notification saying "your cape is on the way". I still don't have it and the 31st is almost over.
Same here. Contacted support with photos of my login screen and notification saying my cape was on the way. They said they couldn't verify I was eligible. WTH!

Success.

I sent support a video capture (i used discord to do this) of me logging in to Minecraft.

Showed my cape notification and my cape inventory. Cape is now there.

"I completely agree! Bedrock Edition could really use the features from Java‚Äôs combat system, like cooldowns, sweeping attacks, and shield mechanics. It would make PvP much more strategic and fun. I'm all for making Minecraft combat more balanced and challenging, so this would be a huge improvement for players on all platforms!"
Agreed, I always used that feature for the arms and legs, and it would be nice to have it for the eyes to
Some people don‚Äôt use the launcher, like mobile and console players. Maybe instead of doing it in the launcher, we could do it in the game itself, in settings.

That would leave out the console and mobile players. Not everyone can afford a PC.

Right with the all the downloads and attention the work arounds on YouTube get plus another platform to monetize and make money off of you think they would of done so by now. It's not even new to them it runs on a version of Android not to mention they already did an Android vr version on the gear vr when that was a thing. It makes so much sense and would allow for a whole community of vr creators and players but they just don't seem to care about it for some reason. Really wish they would reconsider I know my wife and I would both purchase it day 1.

please add this it would be amazing then we can have the ability to still get achievements/advancements if we accidentally turn on cheats
